Projects

Transforming operational complexity into competitive advantage through process intelligence

All projects below were built by Jaden Data, where I serve as Co-founder & Lead Architect.

entAIngine

2023â€“Present Co-founder & Lead Architect Enterprise AI Platform Jaden Data

The AI Engine for Enterprise-Grade Process Automation

Transforms mission-critical back office operations through intelligent automation, knowledge-aware chatbots, and sophisticated document workflows. Built for businesses that demand the highest standards of security, compliance, and performanceâ€”ISO 27001 and SOC2 Type 1 certified with complete data sovereignty.

We architected process intelligence, not just AI tools. Starting with understanding how production facilities, pharmaceutical companies, and financial institutions actually operate, we built custom modules that embed data-driven decision-making into their operational DNA. Handles >1,000 concurrent connections and thousands of RPS with event-driven microservices on AWS.

Industries: Production & Manufacturing, Pharmaceutical, Financial Services, Enterprise Operations
Tech: AWS Lambda, ECS/Fargate, SNS/SQS, OpenAI, Azure, Bedrock, Mistral, RAG, RBAC
Impact: Serving 50+ organizations with 99.9% uptime; ISO 27001/SOC 2 compliance delivered in ~3 months; production-grade reliability enabling faster AI adoption across enterprise workflows.

entAIgent

2023 Co-founder & Lead Architect No-Code AI Agent Platform Jaden Data

Build AI Agent Teams Without Writing Code

Empowers operations teams, customer service, and HR departments to create sophisticated multi-agent AI systems without technical expertise. Through intuitive drag-and-drop design, teams build coordinated AI agents specialized for specific roles and responsibilitiesâ€”turning complex multi-step workflows into visual, manageable processes.

Process-first design means understanding the actual workflow before automating it. Pre-built templates for common business scenarios, custom knowledge bases, and real-time testing capabilities ensure that AI serves the process, not the other way around.

Industries: Operations, Customer Service, HR Automation, Enterprise Workflows
Tech: AI Agents, No-Code, Visual Workflows, Multi-Agent Orchestration, Evals
Impact: Reduced agent PoC deployment from weeks to days; consistent outcomes across teams; faster development cycles with coordinated multi-agent workflows.

Flowhive AI

2022â€“2023 Co-founder & Lead Architect All-in-One AI Workspace Jaden Data

One Platform. Every AI Model. Unlimited Possibilities.

Eliminates the complexity and expense of managing multiple AI tool subscriptions by providing unified access to leading AI models (GPT, Claude, Gemini, Llama, Mistral) in a single collaborative workspace. Designed for fast-moving startups, research teams, and content creators seeking to democratize AI access without vendor lock-in.

Built with deep research capabilities including internet-scanning AI agents, agentic workflows that plan and execute autonomously, and knowledge management with searchable databases. Credit-based pricing means you pay for usage, not per-user seatsâ€”transforming how teams budget for and scale AI adoption.

Industries: Startups, Research Teams, Content Creation, Knowledge Work
Tech: Multi-Model Access, Side-by-Side Comparison, AI Agents, Knowledge Management, Team Collaboration
Impact: Reduced tool sprawl and per-seat costs; faster iteration loops; unified access to multiple AI models in one collaborative workspace.

Flowhive VC

2023 Co-founder & Lead Architect AI for Venture Capital Jaden Data

Portfolio Management Meets Process Intelligence

Venture capital-specialized platform purpose-built for VCs, investment teams, and portfolio managers. Combines deep research capabilities with investment-specific automation to accelerate due diligence and market intelligence.

Pre-configured agents handle company due diligence and competitive analysis, while portfolio intelligence tracking provides AI-driven insights. Deal flow automation streamlines sourcing and evaluation, and market mapping delivers automated sector analysis. The centralized knowledge repository ensures that research and deals knowledge becomes institutional intelligence, not tribal knowledge.

Industries: Venture Capital, Angel Investing, Corporate Venture Arms, Investment Analysis
Tech: AI Agents, Due Diligence Automation, Portfolio Intelligence, Market Mapping, Deal Flow Systems
Impact: Accelerated due diligence processes; AI-driven portfolio insights; faster deal evaluation; centralized research repository scaling investment team capabilities.

Valuation Engine

2022 Co-founder & Lead Architect AI-Powered Property Valuation Jaden Data

Save 2+ Hours Per Appraisal with AI-Driven Research

Specialized AI platform built exclusively for real estate appraisers and valuers. Transforms the time-consuming research and content generation process for professional appraisal reports with location-specific insightsâ€”turning hours of manual work into minutes of actionable intelligence.

Macro and micro location analysis from a single address input, market segment insights with customizable reporting, and multi-source data integration from verified real estate sources. Advanced AI logic provides contextual property analysis, generating appraisal-ready reports formatted for professional use in 2-3 minutes with quality assurance meeting professional appraisal standards.

Industries: Real Estate Appraisal, Property Valuation, Investment Firms, Banking & Collateral Assessment
Tech: Real Estate AI, Location Analysis, Market Intelligence, Report Generation, Multi-Source Data Integration
Impact: 2+ hours saved per appraisal report; higher consistency and accuracy; easier review processes; results delivered in 2-3 minutes per property.

KnowledgeX

2021â€“2022 Co-founder & Lead Architect Trusted Analytics Marketplace Jaden Data

Safe Data Collaboration Without Exposing Sensitive Information

Blockchain-based analytics marketplace enabling cross-organizational insights without exposing sensitive data. Built with confidential compute and auditable workflows to transform how organizations collaborate on data-driven insights while maintaining complete privacy and security.

Process intelligence applied to data collaboration: understanding that businesses need to share insights, not raw data. Confidential compute ensures computational results without data exposure, while blockchain provides immutable audit trails for compliance and trust. Validated with EU stakeholders for real-world applicability.

Industries: Cross-Organizational Analytics, Data Collaboration, Privacy-Sensitive Industries
Tech: Blockchain, Confidential Compute, Analytics Marketplace, Privacy-Preserving Systems, Auditable Workflows
Impact: Enabled safe collaboration without data exposure; prototype validated with EU partners; auditable workflows ensuring compliance and trust.
